seyfert.fisher.fisher_cl_data module¶

Module hosting classes for storing and interfacing with Cl data elements needed for computing fisher matrix.

class seyfert.fisher.fisher_cl_data.DataVector(entries)¶

Bases: object

Class for managing Cl datavector.

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

block_dict: seyfert.base_structs.cl_dict.ClDict¶

cl_vector: numpy.ndarray¶
data_blocks: List[numpy.ndarray]¶
loadClData(cl_dict)¶

Function to load the necessary cl data for building the datavector :type cl_dict: Union[Dict, ClDict] :param cl_dict: the dictionary of Cls (or Cl derivatives) from which to load data :type cl_dict: Union[Dict, ClDict]

Return type

None
